description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Coral Coast, Fiji. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Fiji Coral Coast Private Island Oasis with Immersive Cultural Experiences
hotels.description: Experience authentic Fijian culture and entertainment at the boutique Likuri Island Resort, situated on a private island close to Natadola Beach on the Coral Coast. Marvel at a spectacular fire walking demonstration, learn how to climb a coconut tree or ride the turquoise waves with complimentary access to sea kayaks and stand-up paddle boards. Plus, relax at Likuri Spa and indulge in locally-sourced cuisine with buffet lovo-style meals by the beachside.

hotels.title: Fiji Coral Coast Family-Friendly Escape with Private Beach & Kids Club
hotels.description: Soak up the sun, escape the crowds and set your watch to island time on Fiji's Coral Coast at The Naviti Resort - a beachfront paradise perfect for rest and relaxation. Nestled amid tropical gardens, with a private stretch of sugar-fine sand, The Naviti Resortâ€™s unbeatable location will instantly make you forget the outside world. Spread across 38 acres of tropical palms and just under two hours from Nadi, this is a secluded sanctuary for the entire family. Facilities include an exceptional swimming pool, swim-up bar, four distinct food and drink outlets, the indulgent Joy Spa and a stunning nine-hole golf course. Find a sun-kissed patch of sand to relax on, cool off in the azure Fijian waters or explore the pristine Coral Coast shores by boat. Venture out of the fabulous resort to discover the secrets of the nearby Biausevu Waterfall and Sigatoka Sand Dunes National Park, or take the whole family on an educational daytrip to the Kula WILD Adventure Park.

seo.title: Hoteles en Coral Coast - Fiji Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Coral Coast, Fiji con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
